translated: 2 Increased One Āgama Sutras Scroll 15🔽

original: 東晉罽賓三藏瞿曇僧伽提婆譯
analyzed: 東晉罽賓三藏瞿曇僧伽提婆譯
translated: Translated by Gautama Saṃghadeva, Tripiṭaka Master from Kaśmīra during the Eastern Jin
Chapter 24, Part 2: The Lofty Banner

original: 爾時，彼惡龍吐舌，舐如來手，熟視如來面。
analyzed: 爾時，彼惡龍吐舌，舐如來手，熟視如來面。
translated: At that time, the evil dragon stuck out its tongue, licked the Tathāgata's hand, and stared intently at the Tathāgata's face.

original: 是時，世尊明日清旦，手擎此惡龍，往詣迦葉，語迦葉曰：
analyzed: 是時，世尊明日清旦，手擎此惡龍，往詣迦葉，語迦葉曰：
translated: Then, the World-Honored One, the next morning, held the evil dragon in his hands and went to where Kāśyapa was. He said to Kāśyapa:

original: 「此是惡龍，極為兇暴，今以降之。
analyzed: 「此是惡龍，極為兇暴，今以降之。
translated: This is an evil dragon, extremely ferocious, but now I have subdued it.

original: 」爾時，迦葉見惡龍已，便懷恐怖，白世尊曰：🔽「止！
analyzed: 」爾時，迦葉見惡龍已，便懷恐怖，白世尊曰： 「止！
translated: At that time, when Kāśyapa saw the evil dragon, he became terrified and said to the World-Honored One:🔽Stop!
Stop!
Ascetic!
Do not come any closer, the dragon will surely harm you.
The World-Honored One said:
Kāśyapa!

original: 勿懼，我今已降之，終不相害。
analyzed: 勿懼，我今已降之，終不相害。
translated: Do not be afraid. I have already subdued it and it will not harm you.

original: 所以然者，此龍已受教化。
analyzed: 所以然者，此龍已受教化。
translated: The reason is that this dragon has already been converted.

original: 」是時，迦葉及五百弟子歎未曾有：🔽「甚奇！
analyzed: 」是時，迦葉及五百弟子歎未曾有： 「甚奇！
translated: At that time, Kāśyapa and his five hundred disciples marveled at this unprecedented event:🔽How amazing!
How extraordinary!

original: 此瞿曇沙門極大威神，能降此惡龍，使不作惡；
analyzed: 此瞿曇沙門極大威神，能降此惡龍，使不作惡；
translated: This Śramaṇa Gautama has great spiritual power and can subdue this evil dragon, preventing it from doing harm;
although so, it is still not as good as my attainment of true enlightenment.
At that time, Kāśyapa said to the World-Honored One:
Great Śramaṇa!

original: 當受我九十日請，所須衣被、飯食、床臥具、病瘦醫藥，盡當供給。
analyzed: 當受我九十日請，所須衣被、飯食、床臥具、病瘦醫藥，盡當供給。
translated: Please accept my invitation for ninety days, and I will provide you with all your needs, such as robes, food and drink, bedding, and medicine for illness.
At that time, the World-Honored One silently accepted Kāśyapa's invitation.

original: 時，世尊以此神龍著大海中，而彼惡龍隨壽長短，命終之後，生四天王天上。
analyzed: 時，世尊以此神龍著大海中，而彼惡龍隨壽長短，命終之後，生四天王天上。
translated: Then, the World-Honored One placed this divine dragon in the great ocean, and that evil dragon, according to its lifespan, when its life ended, was reborn in the Heaven of the Four Heavenly Kings.
At that time, the Tathāgata returned to the stone chamber.

original: 迦葉供辦種種飯食已，往白世尊：
analyzed: 迦葉供辦種種飯食已，往白世尊：
translated: When Kāśyapa had prepared various food and drink, he went to inform the World-Honored One, saying:
The food and drink are ready. You may come and eat.
The World-Honored One said:
Kāśyapa, go ahead. I will be there soon.

original: 」迦葉去後，便往至閻浮提界上，閻浮樹下取閻浮果。
analyzed: 」迦葉去後，便往至閻浮提界上，閻浮樹下取閻浮果。
translated: After Kāśyapa left, he went to the border of Jambudvīpa, under the rose-apple tree, and picked a rose-apple.
He returned first and sat in Kāśyapa's stone chamber.

original: 是時，迦葉見世尊在石室中，白世尊曰：
analyzed: 是時，迦葉見世尊在石室中，白世尊曰：
translated: At that time, Kāśyapa saw the World-Honored One sitting in the stone chamber and said to the World-Honored One:
Ascetic!
By what path did you come to the stone chamber?
The Buddha told Kāśyapa:

original: 「汝去之後，吾至閻浮提界上，取閻浮果，還來至此坐。
analyzed: 「汝去之後，吾至閻浮提界上，取閻浮果，還來至此坐。
translated: After you left, I went to the border of Jambudvīpa, picked a rose-apple, and returned to sit here.

original: 迦葉當知，此果甚為香美，可取食之。
analyzed: 迦葉當知，此果甚為香美，可取食之。
translated: Kāśyapa should know that this fruit is very fragrant and delicious. You can pick it and eat it.
Kāśyapa replied:
I don't need it.
The ascetic can pick it and eat it himself.
At that time, Kāśyapa thought again:

original: 「此沙門極有神足，有大威力，乃能至閻浮界上，取此美果。
analyzed: 「此沙門極有神足，有大威力，乃能至閻浮界上，取此美果。
translated: This ascetic has great spiritual powers and great authority, able to go to the border of Jambudvīpa and pick this delicious fruit.
Although so, he is still not as true as my path.
At that time, the World-Honored One finished his meal and returned to his dwelling place.

original: 迦葉清朝至世尊所，到已，白世尊曰：
analyzed: 迦葉清朝至世尊所，到已，白世尊曰：
translated: Kāśyapa arrived at the World-Honored One's place in the morning and said to the World-Honored One:
The meal time has arrived. Please go and have the meal.
The Buddha told Kāśyapa:
You go ahead, and I will come later.

original: 」迦葉去後，便至閻浮界上，取阿摩勒果。
analyzed: 」迦葉去後，便至閻浮界上，取阿摩勒果。
translated: After Kāśyapa left, he went to the border of Jambudvīpa and picked an āmalaka fruit.
He returned and sat in Kāśyapa's stone chamber before Kāśyapa.
Kāśyapa said to the World-Honored One:
Monk!
Which path did you take to get here?
The World-Honored One said:

original: 「汝去之後，至閻浮界上，取此果來，極為香美。
analyzed: 「汝去之後，至閻浮界上，取此果來，極為香美。
translated: After you left, I went to the border of Jambudvīpa and picked this fruit. It is very fragrant and delicious.
If you need it, you can take and eat it.
Kāśyapa replied:
I don't need it. Monk, you can take and eat it yourself.
At that time, Kāśyapa had this thought:

original: 「此沙門極有神力，有大威神，吾去之後，取此果來。
analyzed: 「此沙門極有神力，有大威神，吾去之後，取此果來。
translated: This śramaṇa has great spiritual powers and great authority. After I left, he took the fruit and came back.

original: 雖爾，故不如我，我已得道。
analyzed: 雖爾，故不如我，我已得道。
translated: Although he is like this, he is still not as good as me, because I have attained the Way.
At that time, the World-Honored One finished his meal and returned to his dwelling place to spend the night.

original: 明日，迦葉至世尊所，而作是說：
analyzed: 明日，迦葉至世尊所，而作是說：
translated: The next day, Kāśyapa came to where the World-Honored One was and said:
It is time for the meal. You may come to eat.
The Buddha told Kāśyapa:
You go ahead, and I will come later.

original: 」迦葉去後，世尊至北欝單曰，取自然粳米來，還至迦葉石室。
analyzed: 」迦葉去後，世尊至北欝單曰，取自然粳米來，還至迦葉石室。
translated: After Kāśyapa left, the World-Honored One went to the northern continent of Uttarakuru, took some naturally growing rice, and returned to Kāśyapa's stone chamber.
Kāśyapa asked the Buddha:
Śramaṇa!
Which path did you take to come and sit here?
The World-Honored One said:

original: 「迦葉當知，汝去之後，吾至欝單曰，取自然粳米，極為香好。
analyzed: 「迦葉當知，汝去之後，吾至欝單曰，取自然粳米，極為香好。
translated: Kāśyapa should know, after you left, I went to Uttarakuru, took some naturally growing rice, which is extremely fragrant and delicious.
Kāśyapa!
If you need it, you can take some to eat.
Kāśyapa replied:
I do not need this.
The śramaṇa can take it and eat it himself.
Kāśyapa then thought:
This śramaṇa has great spiritual powers and great supernatural abilities.
Even so, he is still not as good as my attainment of true enlightenment.
At that time, the World-Honored One finished his meal and returned to his dwelling place to spend the night.

original: 明日，迦葉至世尊所，而作是說：
analyzed: 明日，迦葉至世尊所，而作是說：
translated: The next day, Kāśyapa came to where the World-Honored One was and said:
The meal time has arrived. You may come to eat.
The Buddha told Kāśyapa:
You go ahead, and I will come later.

original: 」迦葉去後，世尊至瞿耶尼，取呵梨勒果，先至迦葉石室中坐。
analyzed: 」迦葉去後，世尊至瞿耶尼，取呵梨勒果，先至迦葉石室中坐。
translated: After Kāśyapa left, the World-Honored One went to Godānīya, picked some harītakī fruit, and returned to Kāśyapa's stone chamber to sit.
Kāśyapa asked the Buddha:
Śramaṇa!
From which path did you come and sit here?
The Buddha told Kāśyapa:

original: 「汝去之後，吾至瞿耶尼，取此果來，極為香美。
analyzed: 「汝去之後，吾至瞿耶尼，取此果來，極為香美。
translated: After you left, I went to Kuru and picked this fruit. It is extremely fragrant and delicious.
Kāśyapa!
If you need it, you can take it and eat it.
Kāśyapa replied:
I don't need it.
The śramaṇa can take it and eat it himself.
Kāśyapa then thought:
This śramaṇa has great spiritual powers and great authority.
Although this is so, he is still not as truly enlightened as I am.
At that time, the World-Honored One finished his meal and returned to his dwelling place to spend the night.

original: 明日，迦葉至世尊所而白：
analyzed: 明日，迦葉至世尊所而白：
translated: The next day, Kāśyapa went to where the World-Honored One was and said:
The time has come. You may come and have the meal.
The Buddha told Kāśyapa:
You go ahead, and I will come later.

original: 」迦葉去後，世尊至弗于逮，取毘醯勒果，先至迦葉石室中坐。
analyzed: 」迦葉去後，世尊至弗于逮，取毘醯勒果，先至迦葉石室中坐。
translated: After Kāśyapa left, the World-Honored One went to Pūrvavideha, picked a myrobalan fruit, and arrived first at Kāśyapa's stone chamber to sit.
Kāśyapa asked the Buddha:
Śramaṇa!
From which path did you come and sit here?
The Buddha told Kasyapa:

original: 「汝去之後，吾至弗于逮，取此果來，極為香好。
analyzed: 「汝去之後，吾至弗于逮，取此果來，極為香好。
translated: After you left, I went to the country of Vṛji and picked this fruit. It is extremely fragrant and delicious.
Kasyapa!
If you need it, you can take some and eat it.
Kasyapa replied:
I do not need it. The ascetic can take some and eat it himself.
Kasyapa then thought:
This ascetic has great spiritual powers and great supernormal abilities.
Although this is so, he is still not as truly enlightened as I am.
At that time, the World-Honored One finished his meal and returned to his dwelling place to rest.

original: 是時，迦葉時欲大祠，五百弟子執斧破薪，手擎斧而斧不下。
analyzed: 是時，迦葉時欲大祠，五百弟子執斧破薪，手擎斧而斧不下。
translated: At that time, Kasyapa was about to perform a great sacrifice. His five hundred disciples held axes to chop firewood. They raised their axes but the axes would not descend.
At that time, Kasyapa thought again:
This must be the doing of the ascetic.
At that time, Kasyapa asked the World-Honored One:
Now I want to chop firewood, but why won't the axes descend?
The World-Honored One said:
Do you want the axe to come down?
He said:
I want it to come down.
The axe immediately came down.

original: 是時，彼斧既下，復不得舉。
analyzed: 是時，彼斧既下，復不得舉。
translated: At that time, after the axe came down, it could not be raised again.
Kāśyapa again addressed the Buddha, saying:
Why can't the axe be raised?
The World-Honored One said:
Do you want the axe to be raised?
He said:
I want it to be raised.
The axe was then raised.

original: 爾時，迦葉弟子意欲然火，火不得然。
analyzed: 爾時，迦葉弟子意欲然火，火不得然。
translated: At that time, Kāśyapa's disciples wanted to light a fire, but it would not light.
At that time, Kāśyapa again thought:
This must be the doing of Śramaṇa Gautama.
Kāśyapa addressed the Buddha, saying:
Why won't the fire light?
The Buddha told Kāśyapa:
Do you want the fire to light?
He said:
I want it to light.🔽The fire then lit.

original: 爾時，意欲滅火，火復不滅。
analyzed: 爾時，意欲滅火，火復不滅。
translated: At that time, they wanted to extinguish the fire, but it would not go out.
Kāśyapa addressed the Buddha, saying:
Why does the fire not go out?
The Buddha told Kāśyapa:
Do you want the fire to go out?
He said:
I want it to go out.
The fire then went out.
Kāśyapa then thought:

original: 「此沙門瞿曇，面目端政，世之希有。
analyzed: 「此沙門瞿曇，面目端政，世之希有。
translated: This Śramaṇa Gautama has a handsome face, rarely seen in the world.

original: 吾明日欲大祠，國王人民盡當來集，設當見此沙門者，吾不復得供養。
analyzed: 吾明日欲大祠，國王人民盡當來集，設當見此沙門者，吾不復得供養。
translated: Tomorrow I will be performing a great sacrifice, and the king and people will all gather. If they see this Śramaṇa, I will no longer receive offerings.

original: 此沙門明日不來者，便為大幸。
analyzed: 此沙門明日不來者，便為大幸。
translated: If this Śramaṇa does not come tomorrow, it will be a great blessing.
At that time, the World-Honored One knew what Kāśyapa was thinking in his mind.

original: 明日清旦，至欝單曰，取自然粳米，瞿耶尼取乳汁，往至阿耨達泉而食。
analyzed: 明日清旦，至欝單曰，取自然粳米，瞿耶尼取乳汁，往至阿耨達泉而食。
translated: The next morning, he went to Uttarakuru and obtained naturally grown rice. He went to Kuru to obtain milk, and then went to Lake Anavatapta to eat.

original: 竟日在彼住，向暮還至石室止宿。
analyzed: 竟日在彼住，向暮還至石室止宿。
translated: He stayed there all day and returned to the stone chamber to spend the night.

original: 迦葉明日至世尊所，問曰：
analyzed: 迦葉明日至世尊所，問曰：
translated: The next day, Kāśyapa went to where the World-Honored One was and asked:
Śramaṇa!
Why didn't you come yesterday?
The Buddha told Kāśyapa:
Yesterday you had this thought:
'This Gautama is extremely handsome, a rarity in the world.

original: 吾明日大祠，若國王人民見者，便斷吾供養。
analyzed: 吾明日大祠，若國王人民見者，便斷吾供養。
translated: If the king and people see him tomorrow when I am making a great sacrifice, they will cut off my offerings.
If he doesn't come, it will be a great blessing.'

original: 』我尋知汝心之所念，乃至欝單曰，取自然粳米，瞿耶尼取乳汁，往阿耨達泉上食。
analyzed: 』我尋知汝心之所念，乃至欝單曰，取自然粳米，瞿耶尼取乳汁，往阿耨達泉上食。
translated: I immediately knew what you were thinking, and so I went to Uttarakuru, took naturally grown rice, and to the west of Mount Sumeru, took milk, and ate at Lake Anavatapta.

original: 竟日在彼，向暮還至石室中止宿。
analyzed: 竟日在彼，向暮還至石室中止宿。
translated: I stayed there all day and returned to the stone chamber in the evening to spend the night.
At that time, Kāśyapa had another thought:

original: 「此大沙門，極有神足，實有威神。
analyzed: 「此大沙門，極有神足，實有威神。
translated: This great śramaṇa has great spiritual powers and indeed has awesome virtue.
However, he is still not as good as my attainment of true enlightenment.
At that time, the World-Honored One, having finished his meal, returned to the stone chamber to spend the night.

original: 即夜，四天王至世尊所而聽經法，四天王亦有光明，佛亦大放光，照彼山野，洞然一色。
analyzed: 即夜，四天王至世尊所而聽經法，四天王亦有光明，佛亦大放光，照彼山野，洞然一色。
translated: That night, the Four Heavenly Kings came to where the World-Honored One was to listen to the sutras and expound the Dharma. The Four Heavenly Kings also emitted light, and the Buddha also emitted great light, illuminating the mountains and wilderness, all becoming one color.
At that time, Kāśyapa saw the light at night.

original: 明日清旦，至世尊所，到已，白世尊曰：
analyzed: 明日清旦，至世尊所，到已，白世尊曰：
translated: The next morning, he went to where the World-Honored One was and said to the World-Honored One:
What was the light last night that illuminated the mountains and wilderness?
The World-Honored One said:

original: 「昨夜四天王來至我所而聽法，是彼四天王之光明。
analyzed: 「昨夜四天王來至我所而聽法，是彼四天王之光明。
translated: Last night, the Four Heavenly Kings came to where I was to listen to the Dharma. That was the light of the Four Heavenly Kings.
At that time, Kāśyapa thought again:

original: 「此沙門極有神力，乃能使四天王來聽經法。
analyzed: 「此沙門極有神力，乃能使四天王來聽經法。
translated: This śramaṇa has great spiritual powers, able to cause the Four Heavenly Kings to come and listen to the sutras and expound the Dharma.

original: 雖有此力，由不如我得道真。
analyzed: 雖有此力，由不如我得道真。
translated: Although he has this power, it is still not as good as my attainment of the true path.
At that time, the World-Honored One, after the meal, returned to where he was staying for the night.

original: 夜半，釋提桓因來至世尊所而聽法，天帝光明復照彼山。
analyzed: 夜半，釋提桓因來至世尊所而聽法，天帝光明復照彼山。
translated: In the middle of the night, Śakra, Lord of the Devas, came to where the World-Honored One was to listen to the Dharma. The radiance of the Lord of the Devas also illuminated the mountain.

original: 時，彼迦葉夜起瞻星，見此光明。
analyzed: 時，彼迦葉夜起瞻星，見此光明。
translated: At that time, Kāśyapa got up in the night to gaze at the stars and saw this radiance.

original: 明日清旦，迦葉至世尊所，問曰：
analyzed: 明日清旦，迦葉至世尊所，問曰：
translated: The next morning, Kāśyapa went to where the World-Honored One was and asked:
Gautama!

original: 昨夜光明極為殊特，有何因緣，有此光明？
analyzed: 昨夜光明極為殊特，有何因緣，有此光明？
translated: Last night, the radiance was extremely extraordinary. What was the cause for this radiance?
The World-Honored One said:

original: 「昨夜天帝釋來至此聽經，故有此光明耳。
analyzed: 「昨夜天帝釋來至此聽經，故有此光明耳。
translated: Last night, Śakra, Lord of the Devas, came here to listen to the sūtra, so there was this radiance.
At that time, Kāśyapa again had this thought:

original: 「此沙門瞿曇極有神力，有大威神，乃能使天帝釋來聽經法。
analyzed: 「此沙門瞿曇極有神力，有大威神，乃能使天帝釋來聽經法。
translated: This Śramaṇa Gautama has great spiritual powers and great majestic virtue, as he can cause Śakra, Lord of the Devas, to come and listen to the sūtra.
Although this is so, it is still not as good as my attainment of true enlightenment.
At that time, the World-Honored One, after the meal, returned to where he was staying.

original: 夜半，梵天王放大光明照彼山中，至世尊所而聽經法。
analyzed: 夜半，梵天王放大光明照彼山中，至世尊所而聽經法。
translated: In the middle of the night, Brahma King emitted a great light illuminating the mountain and came to where the World-Honored One was to listen to the sutra.

original: 時，迦葉夜起見光明，明日至世尊所而問曰：
analyzed: 時，迦葉夜起見光明，明日至世尊所而問曰：
translated: At that time, Kasyapa got up in the night and saw the light. The next day, he went to where the World-Honored One was and asked:

original: 「昨夜光明倍有所照，勝於日月光明，有何等因緣，致此光明？
analyzed: 「昨夜光明倍有所照，勝於日月光明，有何等因緣，致此光明？
translated: Last night, the light was twice as bright as the light of the sun and moon. What is the cause for this light?
The World-Honored One said:

original: 「迦葉當知，昨夜大梵天王來至我所而聽經法。
analyzed: 「迦葉當知，昨夜大梵天王來至我所而聽經法。
translated: Kasyapa should know that last night, Brahma King came to where I was to listen to the sutra.
At that time, Kasyapa thought again:

original: 「此沙門瞿曇極有神力，乃能使我祖父來至此沙門所而聽經法。
analyzed: 「此沙門瞿曇極有神力，乃能使我祖父來至此沙門所而聽經法。
translated: This Shakyamuni Gautama has great spiritual power, able to cause my ancestor to come to where this Shakyamuni is to listen to the sutra.
Although this is so, it is still not as good as my attainment of the true path.

original: 」爾時，世尊得弊壞五納衣，意欲浣濯，便作是念：
analyzed: 」爾時，世尊得弊壞五納衣，意欲浣濯，便作是念：
translated: At that time, the World-Honored One obtained a tattered five-piece robe and wanted to wash it. He then thought:
Where should I wash this robe?

original: 」是時，釋提桓因知世尊心中所念，即化作浴池，白世尊曰：
analyzed: 」是時，釋提桓因知世尊心中所念，即化作浴池，白世尊曰：
translated: At that time, Śakra, Lord of the Devas, knew what the World-Honored One was thinking in his mind, and immediately transformed a bathing pool, saying to the World-Honored One:
You can wash your robe here.
At that time, the World-Honored One had another thought:
Where should I step on the robe to wash it?

original: 」時，四天王知世尊心中所念，便舉大方石著水側，白世尊曰：
analyzed: 」時，四天王知世尊心中所念，便舉大方石著水側，白世尊曰：
translated: At that time, the Four Heavenly Kings knew what the World-Honored One was thinking in his mind, and they immediately lifted a large rock and placed it beside the water, saying to the World-Honored One:
You can step on the robe here.
At that time, the World-Honored One had another thought:
Where should I dry this robe?

original: 」時，樹神知世尊心中所念，便垂樹枝，白世尊曰：
analyzed: 」時，樹神知世尊心中所念，便垂樹枝，白世尊曰：
translated: At that time, the tree spirit knew what the World-Honored One was thinking in his mind, and immediately bent down a tree branch, saying to the World-Honored One:
Please dry the robe here.

original: 」明日清旦，迦葉至世尊所，問世尊曰：🔽「本無此池，今有此池；
analyzed: 」明日清旦，迦葉至世尊所，問世尊曰： 「本無此池，今有此池；
translated: The next morning, Kāśyapa went to where the World-Honored One was and asked the World-Honored One:🔽Originally there was no pool here, but now there is this pool;🔽Originally there was no tree here, but now there is this tree;
This tree did not exist before, but now it does.
This rock was not here before, but now it is here.
What is the cause and condition for this change?
The World-Honored One said:

original: 「此是昨夜天帝釋知吾欲浣衣，故作此浴池。
analyzed: 「此是昨夜天帝釋知吾欲浣衣，故作此浴池。
translated: Last night, the Heavenly King knew that I wanted to wash my robe, so he made this bathing pool.
I further had this thought:
'Where should I step on to wash this robe?'

original: 』時四天王知吾心中所念，便持此石來。
analyzed: 』時四天王知吾心中所念，便持此石來。
translated: Then the Four Heavenly Kings, knowing what I was thinking in my mind, brought this rock.
I further had this thought:
'Where should I dry this robe?'

original: 』時樹神知我心中所念，便垂此樹枝耳。
analyzed: 』時樹神知我心中所念，便垂此樹枝耳。
translated: Then the tree spirit, knowing what I was thinking in my mind, lowered this tree branch.
At that time, Kāśyapa had this thought:

original: 「此沙門瞿曇雖神，故不如我得道真。
analyzed: 「此沙門瞿曇雖神，故不如我得道真。
translated: Although this Śramaṇa Gautama is spiritual, he is still not as truly enlightened as I am.
At that time, the World-Honored One, having finished his meal, stayed there for the night.

original: 是時，夜半有大黑雲起而作大雨，連若大河，極為瀑溢。
analyzed: 是時，夜半有大黑雲起而作大雨，連若大河，極為瀑溢。
translated: At that time, in the middle of the night, a great black cloud arose and brought a great rain, causing the Nairañjanā River to swell and overflow.
At that time, Kāśyapa thought again:

original: 「此河瀑溢，沙門必當為水所漂，我今看之。
analyzed: 「此河瀑溢，沙門必當為水所漂，我今看之。
translated: This river is overflowing, the śramaṇa will surely be swept away by the water, I should go and see.

original: 」是時，迦葉及五百弟子往至河所，爾時世尊在水上行，脚不為水所漬。
analyzed: 」是時，迦葉及五百弟子往至河所，爾時世尊在水上行，脚不為水所漬。
translated: At that time, Kāśyapa and his five hundred disciples went to the river. At that time, the World-Honored One was walking on the water, his feet not sinking into the water.

original: 是時，迦葉遙見世尊在水上行。
analyzed: 是時，迦葉遙見世尊在水上行。
translated: At that time, Kāśyapa saw from afar the World-Honored One walking on the water.

original: 是時，迦葉便作是念：🔽「甚奇！
analyzed: 是時，迦葉便作是念： 「甚奇！
translated: At that time, Kāśyapa thought:🔽How marvelous!
How extraordinary!

original: 沙門瞿曇乃能在水上行，我亦能在水上行，但不能使脚不污耳。
analyzed: 沙門瞿曇乃能在水上行，我亦能在水上行，但不能使脚不污耳。
translated: The śramaṇa Gautama is able to walk on water, I too am able to walk on water, but I cannot keep my feet from getting dirty.

original: 此沙門雖神，故不如我得道真。
analyzed: 此沙門雖神，故不如我得道真。
translated: Although this śramaṇa is spiritual, he is still not as good as my attainment of true enlightenment.
At that time, the World-Honored One said to Kāśyapa:

original: 「汝亦非阿羅漢，復不知阿羅漢道，汝尚不識阿羅漢名，況得道乎？
analyzed: 「汝亦非阿羅漢，復不知阿羅漢道，汝尚不識阿羅漢名，況得道乎？
translated: You are not an arhat either, and you do not know the path of an arhat. You do not even know the name of an arhat, let alone the attainment of the path.

original: 汝是盲人，目無所覩，如來現爾許變化，故言：
analyzed: 汝是盲人，目無所覩，如來現爾許變化，故言：
translated: You are blind, seeing nothing. The Tathagata has manifested so many transformations, yet you say:
'I alone have attained true realization.'
You now make this statement:
'I can walk on water.'
Now is the time, can we walk on water together?

original: 汝今可捨邪見之心，無令長夜受此苦惱。
analyzed: 汝今可捨邪見之心，無令長夜受此苦惱。
translated: You should now abandon your wrong views, lest you suffer for a long time.'

original: 」是時，迦葉聞世尊語已，便前頭面禮足：
analyzed: 」是時，迦葉聞世尊語已，便前頭面禮足：
translated: At that time, upon hearing the World-Honored One's words, Kasyapa immediately bowed his head to the Buddha's feet and said:

original: 「我今悔過，深知非法，乃觸如來，唯願受悔。
analyzed: 「我今悔過，深知非法，乃觸如來，唯願受悔。
translated: I now repent and deeply realize that it was not the Dharma to offend the Tathagata. I only pray that you accept my repentance.
In this way, he did so three times.
The World-Honored One said:

original: 「聽汝改過，乃能自知觸擾如來。
analyzed: 「聽汝改過，乃能自知觸擾如來。
translated: I allow you to change your mistake. You can now understand that you disturbed the Tathagata.
At that time, Kasyapa said to his five hundred disciples:

original: 「汝等各隨所宜，我今自歸沙門瞿曇。
analyzed: 「汝等各隨所宜，我今自歸沙門瞿曇。
translated: You may do as you wish. I now take refuge in the ascetic Gautama.
At that time, the five hundred disciples said to Kasyapa:

original: 「我等先亦有心於沙門瞿曇，當降龍時，尋欲歸命。
analyzed: 「我等先亦有心於沙門瞿曇，當降龍時，尋欲歸命。
translated: We also had the intention to take refuge in Shakyamuni when he subdued the dragon.

original: 若師自歸瞿曇者，我等五百弟子盡自歸於瞿曇所。
analyzed: 若師自歸瞿曇者，我等五百弟子盡自歸於瞿曇所。
translated: If you yourself take refuge in Shakyamuni, then all five hundred of our disciples will also take refuge in him.
Kasyapa replied:

original: 「今正是時，然復我心執此愚癡，見爾許變化，意由不解，故自稱言：
analyzed: 「今正是時，然復我心執此愚癡，見爾許變化，意由不解，故自稱言：
translated: Now is the right time. However, my mind is still stuck in this foolishness. Even after seeing so many transformations, my mind still does not understand, and so I continue to claim:
'My path is truly correct.'

original: 』」是時，迦葉將五百弟子，前後圍繞，至世尊所，頭面禮足，在一面立，白世尊曰：
analyzed: 』」是時，迦葉將五百弟子，前後圍繞，至世尊所，頭面禮足，在一面立，白世尊曰：
translated: At that time, Kasyapa, leading his five hundred disciples, surrounded the World-Honored One in front and behind. He bowed his head to the Buddha's feet and stood to one side. He said to the World-Honored One:
I only wish that the World-Honored One would allow us to become monks!
And to cultivate pure conduct.
It is the constant Dharma of the Buddhas.
If one says:
Welcome, bhikshu!
Then one becomes a monk.
At that time, the World-Honored One said to Kasyapa:
Welcome, bhikshu!
This Dharma is subtle and good for cultivating the pure life.

original: 」是時，迦葉及五百弟子所著衣裳，盡變作袈裟，頭髮自落，如似剃髮，以經七日。
analyzed: 」是時，迦葉及五百弟子所著衣裳，盡變作袈裟，頭髮自落，如似剃髮，以經七日。
translated: At that time, the robes worn by Kāśyapa and his five hundred disciples all turned into saṃghāṭī robes, and their hair fell out by itself, as if they had shaved their heads, after seven days.

original: 是時，迦葉學術之具及於呪術，盡投水中。
analyzed: 是時，迦葉學術之具及於呪術，盡投水中。
translated: At that time, Kāśyapa's learning tools and spells were all thrown into the water.
Then, the five hundred disciples said to the World-Honored One:
We only wish that the World-Honored One would allow us to become śramaṇas.
The World-Honored One said:
Welcome, bhikṣus!

original: 」時，五百弟子即成沙門，袈裟著身，頭髮自落。
analyzed: 」時，五百弟子即成沙門，袈裟著身，頭髮自落。
translated: At that time, the five hundred disciples immediately became bhikṣus, with saṃghāṭī robes on their bodies and their hair falling out by itself.

original: 爾時，順水下流，有梵志，名江迦葉，在水側住。
analyzed: 爾時，順水下流，有梵志，名江迦葉，在水側住。
translated: At that time, flowing downstream, there was a brāhmaṇa named Nadī-Kāśyapa, staying by the water.

original: 是時，江迦葉見呪術之具，盡為水所漂，便作是念：
analyzed: 是時，江迦葉見呪術之具，盡為水所漂，便作是念：
translated: At that time, Nadī-Kāśyapa saw that the learning tools and spells were all being carried away by the water, and he thought:
Alas!
Has my elder brother been drowned by the water?

original: 」是時，江迦葉將三百弟子，順水上流，求兄屍骸。
analyzed: 」是時，江迦葉將三百弟子，順水上流，求兄屍骸。
translated: At that time, Gautama Kāśyapa, leading his three hundred disciples, was going upstream on the river, searching for his elder brother's remains.

original: 遙見世尊在一樹下坐，及大迦葉五百弟子前後圍繞而為說法。
analyzed: 遙見世尊在一樹下坐，及大迦葉五百弟子前後圍繞而為說法。
translated: From afar, he saw the World-Honored One sitting under a tree, and Gautama Kāśyapa's five hundred disciples surrounding him in front and back, listening to the Dharma he was expounding.

original: 見已，便前至迦葉所，而作是語：
analyzed: 見已，便前至迦葉所，而作是語：
translated: Having seen this, he immediately went to where Kāśyapa was and said:
Is this a good thing?
You were originally a teacher of people, but now you have become a disciple.

original: 大兄何故與沙門作弟子乎？
analyzed: 大兄何故與沙門作弟子乎？
translated: Why has your elder brother become a disciple of a śramaṇa?
Kāśyapa replied:
This place is wonderful, there is nothing better than this.

original: 」是時，優毘迦葉向江迦葉而說此偈：
analyzed: 」是時，優毘迦葉向江迦葉而說此偈：
translated: At that time, Upa Gautama Kāśyapa spoke this verse to Gautama Kāśyapa:

original: 「此師人天貴，　　我今師事之，
analyzed: 「此師人天貴，　　我今師事之，
translated: This teacher is respected by humans and gods, I now serve him as my teacher.

original: 諸佛興出世，　　甚為難得遇。
analyzed: 諸佛興出世，　　甚為難得遇。
translated: It is very difficult to encounter a Buddha appearing in the world.

original: 」是時，江迦葉聞佛名號，甚懷歡喜，踊躍不能自勝，前白世尊：
analyzed: 」是時，江迦葉聞佛名號，甚懷歡喜，踊躍不能自勝，前白世尊：
translated: At that time, Gautama Kāśyapa, hearing the Buddha's name, was filled with joy and delight, unable to contain himself. He went before the World-Honored One and said:
Please allow me to go forth.
The World-Honored One said:
Welcome, bhikṣus!
Cultivate the holy life well, and end the suffering of the cycle of rebirth.

original: 」是時，江迦葉及三百弟子即成沙門，袈裟著身，頭髮自落。
analyzed: 」是時，江迦葉及三百弟子即成沙門，袈裟著身，頭髮自落。
translated: At that time, Gautama and his three hundred disciples became śramaṇas. Their robes covered their bodies, and their hair fell off by itself.

original: 是時，江迦葉及三百弟子呪術之具，盡投水中。
analyzed: 是時，江迦葉及三百弟子呪術之具，盡投水中。
translated: At that time, Gautama and his three hundred disciples threw all their magical implements into the water.

original: 爾時，順水下頭有梵志，名伽夷迦葉，在水側住。
analyzed: 爾時，順水下頭有梵志，名伽夷迦葉，在水側住。
translated: At that time, there was a brāhman named Uruvilvā-Kāśyapa who was living by the river.

original: 遙見呪術之具，為水所漂，便作是念：
analyzed: 遙見呪術之具，為水所漂，便作是念：
translated: He saw from afar the magical implements being carried away by the water, and thought:
I have two elder brothers who are studying the Way upstream.

original: 今呪術之具，盡為水所漂，二大迦葉必為水所害。
analyzed: 今呪術之具，盡為水所漂，二大迦葉必為水所害。
translated: Now the magical implements are all being carried away by the water. The two Kāśyapa brothers must have been harmed by the water.🔽He then led two hundred disciples upstream to the place where they were studying. Seeing his two elder brothers from afar, he said:

original: 」即將二百弟子，順水上流，乃至學術之處，遙見二兄而作沙門，便作是語：
analyzed: 」即將二百弟子，順水上流，乃至學術之處，遙見二兄而作沙門，便作是語：
translated: My two elder brothers have gone forth.
Is this place good?

original: 本為人尊，今為沙門弟子。
analyzed: 本為人尊，今為沙門弟子。
translated: You were originally a respected person, now you are a disciple of the Śramaṇa.
Kāśyapa replied:
This place is the most wonderful, there is nothing better than this place.
At that time, Gayākāśyapa thought like this:

original: 「今我二兄多知博學，此處必是善地，使我二兄在中學道，我今亦可在中學道。
analyzed: 「今我二兄多知博學，此處必是善地，使我二兄在中學道，我今亦可在中學道。
translated: Now my two older brothers are very knowledgeable and learned, this place must be a good place, since it caused my two older brothers to study the path here, I can also study the path here.
At that time, Gayākāśyapa said to the World-Honored One:
May the World-Honored One allow me to become a Śramaṇa.
The World-Honored One said:
Welcome, Bhikṣu!
Cultivate the pure practices well and end the bounds of suffering.

original: 」是時，伽夷迦葉即成沙門，袈裟著身，頭髮自落，如似剃頭，以經七日。
analyzed: 」是時，伽夷迦葉即成沙門，袈裟著身，頭髮自落，如似剃頭，以經七日。
translated: At that time, Gayākāśyapa immediately became a Śramaṇa, the kaṣāya robe was on his body, and his hair fell out by itself, just like having a haircut. After seven days,

original: 是時，世尊在彼河側住，尼拘類樹下，成佛未久，將千弟子，是皆耆舊宿長。
analyzed: 是時，世尊在彼河側住，尼拘類樹下，成佛未久，將千弟子，是皆耆舊宿長。
translated: At that time, the World-Honored One was staying by the side of that river, under a nyagrodha tree, not long after becoming a Buddha, with a thousand disciples, all of whom were elderly and venerable.
At that time, the World-Honored One taught and transformed with three things.
What are the three?

original: 所謂神足教化，言教教化，訓誨教化。
analyzed: 所謂神足教化，言教教化，訓誨教化。
translated: Namely, teaching and transforming with spiritual powers, teaching and transforming with words, and teaching and transforming with instruction.
What is meant by teaching and transforming with spiritual powers?

original: 爾時，世尊或作若干形，還合為一，或不現，或現。
analyzed: 爾時，世尊或作若干形，還合為一，或不現，或現。
translated: At that time, the World-Honored One sometimes transformed into many forms and then combined them into one, sometimes disappearing, and sometimes manifesting.

original: 石壁皆過，無所罣礙，或出地，或入地，猶如流水，無所觸礙，或結跏趺坐，滿虛空中，如鳥飛空，無有罣礙。
analyzed: 石壁皆過，無所罣礙，或出地，或入地，猶如流水，無所觸礙，或結跏趺坐，滿虛空中，如鳥飛空，無有罣礙。
translated: Passing through stone walls without obstruction, sometimes emerging from the ground or entering the ground like flowing water, without any hindrance, sometimes sitting cross-legged in full lotus in the empty sky, like a bird flying through the sky without obstruction.
Also like a great volcanic eruption, emitting immeasurable smoke.

original: 此日月有大神力，不可限量，以手往捉，身乃至梵天。
analyzed: 此日月有大神力，不可限量，以手往捉，身乃至梵天。
translated: The sun and moon have great spiritual powers, immeasurable, and he would reach up and touch them with his body up to the Brahma Heaven.
Thus, the World-Honored One manifests spiritual powers.
What is called teaching and transforming through speech?

original: 爾時，世尊教諸比丘：🔽「當捨是、置是。
analyzed: 爾時，世尊教諸比丘： 「當捨是、置是。
translated: At that time, the World-Honored One taught the bhikṣus:🔽Abandon this, set aside this.
Approach this, distance yourself from this.
Remember this, forget this.
Contemplate this, do not contemplate this.

original: 」彼云何當修是、不修是者，當修七覺意，滅三結。
analyzed: 」彼云何當修是、不修是者，當修七覺意，滅三結。
translated: What is meant by cultivate this and not cultivate this? Cultivate the seven factors of awakening and extinguish the three bonds.
What is meant by contemplate this and not contemplate this?
Contemplate the three bonds and the good of the śramaṇa:

original: 所謂出要樂、無恚樂、無怒樂。
analyzed: 所謂出要樂、無恚樂、無怒樂。
translated: Namely, the bliss of renunciation, the bliss of non-anger, and the bliss of non-violence.
What is meant by not contemplate?
Namely, the three bonds and the suffering of the śramaṇa.
What are the three?
Namely, the contemplation of desire, the contemplation of anger, and the contemplation of violence.
What is meant by remember this and not remember this?

original: 爾時，當念苦諦，當念習諦，當念盡諦，當念道諦；
analyzed: 爾時，當念苦諦，當念習諦，當念盡諦，當念道諦；
translated: At that time, remember the truth of suffering, remember the truth of the accumulation [of suffering], remember the truth of the cessation [of suffering], remember the truth of the path;
Do not think of wrong views:

original: 有常見、無常見，有邊見、無邊見，彼命、彼身，非命、非身，如來命終、如來不命終，有終、有不終，亦不有終、亦不無終。
analyzed: 有常見、無常見，有邊見、無邊見，彼命、彼身，非命、非身，如來命終、如來不命終，有終、有不終，亦不有終、亦不無終。
translated: The view of existence, the view of non-existence, the view of the end, the view of no end, that life is the body, that life is not the body, that the Tathāgata exists after death, that the Tathāgata does not exist after death, that he both exists and does not exist after death, and that he neither exists nor does not exist after death.
Do not have these thoughts.
What is meant by instruction and guidance?

original: 復次，當作是去、不應作是去，作是來、不應作是來，默然、作是言說：
analyzed: 復次，當作是去、不應作是去，作是來、不應作是來，默然、作是言說：
translated: Furthermore, one should go in this way, not in that way; one should come in this way, not in that way; one should be silent, not speak in this way;

original: 「當持如是衣、不應持如是衣，應如是入村、不應如是入村。
analyzed: 「當持如是衣、不應持如是衣，應如是入村、不應如是入村。
translated: One should hold such robes, not such robes; one should enter the village in this way, not in that way.
This is called instruction and guidance.

original: 是時，世尊以此三事，教化千比丘。
analyzed: 是時，世尊以此三事，教化千比丘。
translated: At that time, the World-Honored One used these three things to guide and transform the thousand bhikṣus.

original: 是時，彼比丘受佛教已，千比丘盡成阿羅漢。
analyzed: 是時，彼比丘受佛教已，千比丘盡成阿羅漢。
translated: At that time, after the bhikṣus received the Buddha's teachings, the thousand bhikṣus all attained arhatship.

original: 是時，世尊以見千比丘得羅漢，爾時閻浮里地有千阿羅漢及五比丘，佛為六師，迴坐向迦毘羅衛。
analyzed: 是時，世尊以見千比丘得羅漢，爾時閻浮里地有千阿羅漢及五比丘，佛為六師，迴坐向迦毘羅衛。
translated: At that time, the World-Honored One saw that the thousand bhikṣus had attained arhatship. At that time, there were a thousand arhats and five bhikṣus in Jambudvīpa, with the Buddha as the sixth teacher. He turned his seat towards Kapilavastu.

original: 是時，優毘迦葉便作是念：
analyzed: 是時，優毘迦葉便作是念：
translated: At that time, Upāli Kāśyapa had this thought:
Why is the World-Honored One sitting facing Kapilavastu?

original: 」是時，優毘迦葉即前長跪，白世尊曰：
analyzed: 」是時，優毘迦葉即前長跪，白世尊曰：
translated: At that time, Upāli Kāśyapa knelt for a long time and said to the World-Honored One:

original: 「不審如來，何故向迦毘羅衛坐耶？
analyzed: 「不審如來，何故向迦毘羅衛坐耶？
translated: I do not know why the Tathāgata is sitting facing Kapilavastu.
The World-Honored One said:
When the Tathāgata is in the world, he should perform five things.
What are the five?

original: 一者當轉法輪，二者當與父說法，三者當與母說法，四者當導凡夫人立菩薩行，五者當授菩薩別。
analyzed: 一者當轉法輪，二者當與父說法，三者當與母說法，四者當導凡夫人立菩薩行，五者當授菩薩別。
translated: First, he should turn the wheel of the Dharma; second, he should expound the Dharma to his father; third, he should expound the Dharma to his mother; fourth, he should guide ordinary people to establish bodhisattva practices; fifth, he should bestow the prediction of enlightenment to bodhisattvas.
This is what it means, Kāśyapa!
When the Tathāgata appears in the world, he should perform these five things.
At that time, Upa Gāyatha thought like this:

original: 「如來故念親族本邦，故向彼坐耳。
analyzed: 「如來故念親族本邦，故向彼坐耳。
translated: The Tathāgata is thinking of his relatives and hometown, so he is sitting facing that direction.

original: 」是時，五比丘漸來至尼連水側，到世尊所，頭面禮足，在一面坐。
analyzed: 」是時，五比丘漸來至尼連水側，到世尊所，頭面禮足，在一面坐。
translated: At that time, the five bhikṣus gradually came to the side of the Nairañjanā River, went to where the World-Honored One was, bowed their heads at his feet, and sat to one side.

original: 是時，尊者優陀耶遙見世尊向迦毘羅衛坐，見已，便作是念：
analyzed: 是時，尊者優陀耶遙見世尊向迦毘羅衛坐，見已，便作是念：
translated: At that time, Venerable Udāyin saw from afar the World-Honored One sitting facing Kapilavastu. Having seen this, he immediately thought like this:

original: 「世尊必當欲往至迦毘羅衛見諸親里。
analyzed: 「世尊必當欲往至迦毘羅衛見諸親里。
translated: The World-Honored One must want to go to Kapilavastu to see his relatives.

original: 」是時，優陀耶即前長跪，白世尊曰：
analyzed: 」是時，優陀耶即前長跪，白世尊曰：
translated: At that time, Udāyin immediately knelt for a long time and said to the World-Honored One:

original: 「我今堪任欲有所問，唯願敷演。
analyzed: 「我今堪任欲有所問，唯願敷演。
translated: I am now able and willing to ask about something. I only wish that you will explain it.
The World-Honored One said:
If you want to ask about it, then ask.
Udāyin said to the World-Honored One:
Observing the Tathāgata's intention, you want to go to Kapilavastu.
The World-Honored One said:
It is so, as you have said.

original: 優陀耶當知，先至白淨王所，吾比後當往。
analyzed: 優陀耶當知，先至白淨王所，吾比後當往。
translated: Udayin, you should know that I will go to King Suddhodana first, and I will go later.

original: 所以然者，剎利之種先當遣使令知，然後如來當往。
analyzed: 所以然者，剎利之種先當遣使令知，然後如來當往。
translated: The reason is that the kshatriya class should first send a messenger to inform them, and then the Tathagata will go.
When you arrive, tell the king:
'After seven days, the Tathagata will come to see the king.'🔽 Udayin replied:
Yes.
World-Honored One!

original: 」是時，優陀耶即從坐起，整衣服，禮世尊足，於世尊前不現，往至迦毘羅衛，到真淨王所。
analyzed: 」是時，優陀耶即從坐起，整衣服，禮世尊足，於世尊前不現，往至迦毘羅衛，到真淨王所。
translated: At that time, Udayin immediately rose from his seat, adjusted his robes, bowed at the World-Honored One's feet, disappeared before the World-Honored One, went to Kapilavastu, and arrived at King Suddhodana's place.
Having arrived, he stood in front of the king.

original: 爾時，真淨王在大殿上坐，及諸婇女。
analyzed: 爾時，真淨王在大殿上坐，及諸婇女。
translated: At that time, King Suddhodana was sitting in the great hall with his court ladies.
At that time, Udayin flew in the sky.

original: 時真淨王見優陀耶手執鉢，持杖而在前立，見已便懷恐怖，而作是說：
analyzed: 時真淨王見優陀耶手執鉢，持杖而在前立，見已便懷恐怖，而作是說：
translated: When King Suddhodana saw Udayin holding a bowl and staff standing in front, he became frightened and said:
Who is this person?
Is he a human?
Or is he a non-human?
Is he a god?
Or a ghost?
Or a yakṣa, rākṣasa, god, dragon, ghost, or spirit?
Then King Śuddhodana asked Udayin:
Who are you?
And he spoke this verse to Udayin:
Are you a god or a ghost?
Or a gandharva and so forth?
What is your name now?
I wish to know.

original: 」是時，優陀耶復以此偈報王曰：
analyzed: 」是時，優陀耶復以此偈報王曰：
translated: At that time, Udayin replied to the king with this verse:

original: 「我亦非是天，　　非是乾沓惒，
analyzed: 「我亦非是天，　　非是乾沓惒，
translated: I am neither a god nor a gandharva,

original: 於是迦毘國，　　大王邦土人。
analyzed: 於是迦毘國，　　大王邦土人。
translated: I am a person from the great king's realm in the country of Kapila.

original: 昔壞十八億，　　弊魔波旬眾，
analyzed: 昔壞十八億，　　弊魔波旬眾，
translated: In the past, I destroyed the eighteen koṭis of the evil Māra Pāpīyān's followers,

original: 我師釋迦文，　　是彼真弟子。
analyzed: 我師釋迦文，　　是彼真弟子。
translated: My teacher is Śākyamuni, the true disciple of that [Buddha].

original: 」時，真淨王復以此偈，向優陀耶說：
analyzed: 」時，真淨王復以此偈，向優陀耶說：
translated: Then King Śuddhodana again spoke this verse to Udayin:

original: 「誰壞十八億，　　弊魔波旬眾？
analyzed: 「誰壞十八億，　　弊魔波旬眾？
translated: Who destroyed the eighteen koṭis of the evil Māra Pāpīyān's followers?
Who is called Śākyamuni?
You should now praise and speak of him.
At that time, Udāyin spoke this verse:

original: 「如來初生時，　　天地普大動，
analyzed: 「如來初生時，　　天地普大動，
translated: When the Tathāgata was first born, the heavens and earth greatly shook.

original: 誓願悉成辦，　　今曰號悉達！
analyzed: 誓願悉成辦，　　今曰號悉達！
translated: His vows were all accomplished, and today he is called Siddhārtha!

original: 彼降十八億，　　弊魔波旬眾，
analyzed: 彼降十八億，　　弊魔波旬眾，
translated: He subdued the eighteen koṭis of the evil Māra Pāpīyān's followers,

original: 彼名釋迦文，　　今日成佛道！
analyzed: 彼名釋迦文，　　今日成佛道！
translated: and he is called Śākyamuni, who today attained Buddhahood!

original: 彼人釋師子，　　瞿曇次弟子，
analyzed: 彼人釋師子，　　瞿曇次弟子，
translated: That man, the Lion of the Śākyas, the disciple next to Gautama,

original: 今日作沙門，　　本字優陀耶！
analyzed: 今日作沙門，　　本字優陀耶！
translated: today became a monk, and his original name was Udāyin!

original: 」是時，真淨王聞此語已，便懷歡喜，不能自勝，語優陀耶曰：
analyzed: 」是時，真淨王聞此語已，便懷歡喜，不能自勝，語優陀耶曰：
translated: At that time, King Śuddhodana, having heard these words, was overjoyed and could not contain himself. He said to Udāyin:
What is it, Udāyin!
Is Siddhārtha still alive?🔽Udāyin replied:
Yes, he is.
The Buddha Shakyamuni is present today.
At that time, the king asked:
Has he already attained Buddhahood?
Udayin replied:
He has already attained Buddhahood.
The king asked again:
Where is the Tathagata now?
Udayin replied:

original: 「如來今在摩竭國界尼拘類樹下。
analyzed: 「如來今在摩竭國界尼拘類樹下。
translated: The Tathagata is now under a nyagrodha tree in the Magadha country.
The king said:
Who are the disciples who follow him?
Udayin replied:

original: 「諸天億數及千比丘、四天王，恒在左右。
analyzed: 「諸天億數及千比丘、四天王，恒在左右。
translated: There are billions of devas and a thousand bhikshus, the Four Heavenly Kings, always at his left and right.
The king asked again:
What kind of clothes does he wear?
Udayin replied:
The clothes the Tathagata wears are called kasaya.
The king asked again:
What kind of food does he eat?
Udayin replied:
The body of the Tathāgata takes the Dharma as food.
The king asked again:
How is it, Uttiya?
Can the Tathāgata be seen?
Uttiya replied:

original: 「王勿愁悒，却後七日，如來當來入城。
analyzed: 「王勿愁悒，却後七日，如來當來入城。
translated: Your Majesty should not be sorrowful. After seven days, the Tathāgata will come and enter the city.

original: 」是時，王極歡喜，不能自勝，手自斟酌，供養優陀耶。
analyzed: 」是時，王極歡喜，不能自勝，手自斟酌，供養優陀耶。
translated: At that time, King Suddhodana was overjoyed and could not contain himself. He personally served and made offerings to Uttiya.

original: 是時，真淨王擊大鳴鼓，勅國界人民，平治道路，除去不淨，以香汁灑地，懸繒幡蓋，作倡伎樂，不可稱計。
analyzed: 是時，真淨王擊大鳴鼓，勅國界人民，平治道路，除去不淨，以香汁灑地，懸繒幡蓋，作倡伎樂，不可稱計。
translated: At that time, King Suddhodana beat the great drum and ordered the people of the country to level the roads, remove impurities, sprinkle the ground with fragrant water, hang silk banners and canopies, and play countless kinds of music.

original: 復勅國中諸有聾、盲、瘖瘂者，盡使不現，却後七日，悉達當來入城。
analyzed: 復勅國中諸有聾、盲、瘖瘂者，盡使不現，却後七日，悉達當來入城。
translated: He also ordered that all the deaf, blind, and mute in the country be hidden, and after seven days, Siddhārtha would come and enter the city.

original: 是時，真淨王聞佛當來入城，七日之中，亦不睡眠。
analyzed: 是時，真淨王聞佛當來入城，七日之中，亦不睡眠。
translated: At that time, when King Suddhodana heard that the Buddha would come and enter the city, he did not sleep for seven days.

original: 是時，世尊以至七日，便作是念：
analyzed: 是時，世尊以至七日，便作是念：
translated: At that time, the World-Honored One, after seven days, had this thought:

original: 「我今宜可以神足力，往詣迦毘羅衛國。
analyzed: 「我今宜可以神足力，往詣迦毘羅衛國。
translated: I should now use my spiritual powers to go to the country of Kapilavastu.

original: 」是時，世尊即將諸比丘，前後圍遶，往詣迦毘羅衛國。
analyzed: 」是時，世尊即將諸比丘，前後圍遶，往詣迦毘羅衛國。
translated: At that time, the World-Honored One, leading the bhikṣus surrounding him in front and back, went to the country of Kapilavastu.

original: 到已，便詣城北薩盧園中。
analyzed: 到已，便詣城北薩盧園中。
translated: Having arrived, he went to the Sālavana grove to the north of the city.

original: 是時，真淨王聞世尊已達迦毘羅衛城北薩盧園中。
analyzed: 是時，真淨王聞世尊已達迦毘羅衛城北薩盧園中。
translated: At that time, King Śuddhodana heard that the World-Honored One had already arrived at the Sālavana grove to the north of the city of Kapilavastu.

original: 是時，真淨王將諸釋眾，往詣世尊所。
analyzed: 是時，真淨王將諸釋眾，往詣世尊所。
translated: At that time, King Śuddhodana, leading the Śākya assembly, went to where the World-Honored One was.
At that time, the World-Honored One had this thought again:

original: 「若真淨王躬自來者，此非我宜，我今當往與共相見。
analyzed: 「若真淨王躬自來者，此非我宜，我今當往與共相見。
translated: If King Śuddhodana comes himself, it is not suitable for me. I should now go to meet him.

original: 所以然者，父母恩重，育養情甚。
analyzed: 所以然者，父母恩重，育養情甚。
translated: The reason is that the kindness of parents is heavy, and they nurture with deep affection.

original: 」是時，世尊將諸比丘眾，往詣城門，飛在虛空，去地七仞。
analyzed: 」是時，世尊將諸比丘眾，往詣城門，飛在虛空，去地七仞。
translated: At that time, the World-Honored One, leading the assembly of bhikṣus, went to the city gate, flying in the sky seven fathoms above the ground.

original: 是時，真淨王見世尊端政無比，世之希有，諸根寂靜，無眾多念，身有三十二相、八十種好，而自莊身，發歡喜之心，即便頭面禮足，而作是說：
analyzed: 是時，真淨王見世尊端政無比，世之希有，諸根寂靜，無眾多念，身有三十二相、八十種好，而自莊身，發歡喜之心，即便頭面禮足，而作是說：
translated: At that time, King Suddhodana saw that the World-Honored One was incomparably upright, a rarity in the world, with tranquil faculties, few thoughts, and his body adorned with the thirty-two marks and eighty minor marks, and gave rise to a joyful mind. He then bowed his head to the Buddha's feet and said:
I am a king of the kshatriya caste, named King Suddhodana.
The World-Honored One said:
May the Great King enjoy boundless longevity.
Therefore, Great King!

original: 當以正法治化，勿用邪法。
analyzed: 當以正法治化，勿用邪法。
translated: You should govern with the right Dharma, not with wrong Dharma.

original: 大王當知，諸有用正法治化者，身壞命終，生善處天上。
analyzed: 大王當知，諸有用正法治化者，身壞命終，生善處天上。
translated: Great King, you should know that those who govern with the right Dharma, when their body perishes and life ends, will be reborn in a good place, in the heavens.

original: 」是時，世尊即空中行，至真淨王宮中。
analyzed: 」是時，世尊即空中行，至真淨王宮中。
translated: At that time, the World-Honored One then walked through the air to King Suddhodana's palace.
Having arrived, he took his seat.🔽Here is the corrected and aligned text:

original: 時，王見世尊坐定，手自斟酌，行種種飲食，見世尊食竟，行淨水，更取一小座而聽經。
analyzed: 時，王見世尊坐定，手自斟酌，行種種飲食，見世尊食竟，行淨水，更取一小座而聽經。
translated: At that time, the king saw that the World-Honored One had sat down and personally served various kinds of food and drink. Seeing that the World-Honored One had finished eating, he served clean water, took a small seat, and listened to the sutra.

original: 爾時，世尊與真淨王漸說妙義，所謂論者：
analyzed: 爾時，世尊與真淨王漸說妙義，所謂論者：
translated: At that time, the World-Honored One gradually spoke the wonderful meaning with King Suddhodana. The discussion was as follows:

original: 施論、戒論、生天之論，欲不淨行，出要為樂。
analyzed: 施論、戒論、生天之論，欲不淨行，出要為樂。
translated: Discussion on giving, discussion on precepts, discussion on being born in the heavens, the impurity of desires, and liberation as bliss.

original: 爾時，世尊見王心開意解，諸佛世尊常所說法，苦、習、盡、道，盡向王說。
analyzed: 爾時，世尊見王心開意解，諸佛世尊常所說法，苦、習、盡、道，盡向王說。
translated: At that time, the World-Honored One saw that the king's mind was open and his understanding was liberated. The teachings that the Buddhas always speak, on suffering, its origin, its cessation, and the path, he spoke to the king in full.

original: 是時，真淨王即於座上，諸塵垢盡，得法眼淨。
analyzed: 是時，真淨王即於座上，諸塵垢盡，得法眼淨。
translated: At that time, King Suddhodana immediately eliminated all dust and defilements while sitting, and attained the pure Dharma eye.

original: 是時，世尊與王說法已，即從座起而去。
analyzed: 是時，世尊與王說法已，即從座起而去。
translated: At that time, after the World-Honored One had spoken the Dharma for the king, he immediately rose from his seat and left.

original: 是時，真淨王普集釋眾，而作是說：
analyzed: 是時，真淨王普集釋眾，而作是說：
translated: At that time, King Suddhodana gathered the Śākya assembly and said this:

original: 「諸沙門等，顏貌極醜，剎利之種，將諸梵志眾，此非其宜；
analyzed: 「諸沙門等，顏貌極醜，剎利之種，將諸梵志眾，此非其宜；
translated: The śramaṇas have extremely ugly appearances. It is not appropriate for the kṣatriyas to take the multitude of brahmins.

original: 剎利釋種還得剎利眾，此乃為妙。
analyzed: 剎利釋種還得剎利眾，此乃為妙。
translated: It would be wonderful if the kṣatriya Śākya clan were to obtain a kṣatriya assembly.
The Śākyas replied:
It is like this, great king!

original: 如大王教，剎利還得剎利眾，此乃為妙。
analyzed: 如大王教，剎利還得剎利眾，此乃為妙。
translated: As the great king teaches, it would be wonderful if the kṣatriyas were to obtain a kṣatriya assembly.
Then the king announced to the country:

original: 「諸有兄弟二人，當取一人作道，其不爾者，當重謫罰。

original: 「諸有兄弟二人，當取一人為道，其不從教，當重謫罰。

translated: If there are brothers who are two in number, one should be made to go forth. Those who do not follow the teaching will be severely punished.

original: 」是時，提婆達兜釋種語阿難釋言：

Today King Śuddhodana has issued a decree:

analyzed: 『諸有兄弟二人，當分一人作道。

original: 』汝今出家學道，我當在家修治家業。

translated: 'Now that you have left home to study the path, I will stay at home to manage the household affairs.'

As my elder brother instructs.

King Suddhodana has an order:

original: 『其有兄弟二人者，當分一人作道，其不爾者，當重謫罰。
analyzed: 『其有兄弟二人者，當分一人作道，其不爾者，當重謫罰。
translated: 'For brothers who are two in number, one should leave home to study the path. If one does not do so, there will be heavy punishment.'

original: 」是時，阿那律釋聞此語已，歡喜踊躍，不能自勝，報曰：

original: 爾時，駕四馬之車，白車、白蓋，白馬駕之；
analyzed: 爾時，駕四馬之車，白車、白蓋，白馬駕之；
translated: At that time, he rode in a four-horse chariot, with a white chariot and a white canopy drawn by white horses;

analyzed: 第二釋乘青車、青蓋，青馬駕之；
translated: The second explained that he rode a blue chariot with a blue canopy, drawn by blue horses;

original: 第三釋乘黃車、黃蓋，黃馬駕之；
analyzed: 第三釋乘黃車、黃蓋，黃馬駕之；
translated: the third explained that he rode a yellow chariot with a yellow canopy, drawn by yellow horses;

original: 第四釋乘赤車、赤蓋，赤馬駕之。
analyzed: 第四釋乘赤車、赤蓋，赤馬駕之。
translated: the fourth explained that he rode a red chariot with a red canopy, drawn by red horses.

original: 是時，諸釋有乘象者，有乘馬者，皆悉來集。
analyzed: 是時，諸釋有乘象者，有乘馬者，皆悉來集。
translated: At that time, some of the Śākyas rode elephants, some rode horses, and they all gathered together.

original: 是時，世尊遙見真淨王將諸釋眾而來，告諸比丘：
analyzed: 是時，世尊遙見真淨王將諸釋眾而來，告諸比丘：
translated: At that time, the World-Honored One saw from afar that King Śuddhodana was coming with the assembly of Śākyas, and he told the bhikṣus:

analyzed: 「汝等觀此釋眾，并觀真淨王眾。
translated: You all observe this assembly of Śākyas and the assembly of King Śuddhodana.

original: 比丘當知，三十三天出園觀時，亦如此法，無有異。
analyzed: 比丘當知，三十三天出園觀時，亦如此法，無有異。
translated: Bhikṣus, you should know that when the Thirty-three Celestials go out to the garden, it is also like this, without any difference.

original: 」是時，阿難乘大白象、白衣、白蓋。
analyzed: 」是時，阿難乘大白象、白衣、白蓋。
translated: At that time, Ānanda rode a great white elephant, wearing white clothes and a white canopy.

original: 「汝等見此阿難釋乘白象、白衣不乎？
analyzed: 「汝等見此阿難釋乘白象、白衣不乎？
translated: Do you all see Ānanda, the Śākya, riding a white elephant, wearing white clothes?

We see it.
The Buddha told the bhikṣus:

original: 「此人當出家學道，第一多聞，堪侍左右。
analyzed: 「此人當出家學道，第一多聞，堪侍左右。
translated: This person will leave the household life to study the path, be the most learned, and be able to attend to me.
Do you see this Anuruddha?
The bhikṣus replied:
Yes, we see him.
The Buddha told the bhikṣus:
This person will leave the household life to study the path and have the foremost divine eye.

original: 」是時，真淨王及兄弟四人，并難陀、阿難，皆步進前，除去五好，至世尊所，頭面禮足，在一面坐。

translated: At that time, King Suddhodana and his four brothers, Nanda, and Ānanda all walked forward, removed their five adornments, went to where the World-Honored One was, bowed their heads at his feet, and sat to one side.

Last night I had this thought:

original: 『剎利之眾不應將梵志眾，還將剎利眾，此是其宜。

' I then issued an order throughout the country:

Great King!
You benefit many, and gods and humans find peace.

original: 所以然者，此善知識良祐福田，我亦緣善知識，得脫此生、老、病、死。
analyzed: 所以然者，此善知識良祐福田，我亦緣善知識，得脫此生、老、病、死。
translated: The reason is this: this good and virtuous field of blessings, I too rely on good and virtuous friends, and attain liberation from birth, old age, sickness, and death.

analyzed: 「唯願世尊教誨此新比丘，當如教誨優陀耶！
translated: I only wish that the World-Honored One would instruct these new monks, just as you instruct Udāyin!

original: 所以然者，此優陀耶比丘極有神力。
analyzed: 所以然者，此優陀耶比丘極有神力。
translated: The reason is this: this monk Udāyin has great spiritual power.

translated: I wish that monk Udāyin would always be in the palace teaching and transforming, causing sentient beings to attain peace and security for a long time.

translated: The reason is this: this monk has great spiritual power. When I first saw monk Udāyin, I immediately gave rise to a joyful mind.

analyzed: 『弟子尚有神力，況彼如來而無此神力乎？

analyzed: 能勸化人民，優陀耶比丘是。
translated: The one who is able to guide and transform the people is the monk Udayin.

translated: The one with many disciples is the monk Uruvela-Kasyapa.

translated: The one who attains the observation of emptiness with the mind is the monk NadI-Kasyapa.

translated: At that time, the World-Honored One extensively expounded the subtle and wonderful Dharma for King Prasenajit.
